<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#flavors_yaml" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">flavors</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="#getflavorsflavor">List&lt;Property Map&gt;</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Indicates the flavors information. Structure is documented below.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-"
            title="">
        <span id="id_yaml">

</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">String</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>The provider-assigned unique ID for this managed resource.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-"
            title="">
        <span id="region_yaml">

        <span class="property-type">String</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>The region where the node resides.</p>

            title="">
        <span id="memory_yaml">

        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">Number</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>The memory size in GB.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-"
            title="">
        <span id="name_yaml">

</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">String</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>The name of the CSS flavor. It is referenced by <code>node_config.flavor</code> in <code>huaweicloud.Css.Cluster</code>.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-"
            title="">

</span>

        <span class="property-type">String</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>The node instance type.</p>

        <span class="property-type">String</span>

<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#name_yaml" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">name</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">String</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Specifies the name of the CSS flavor.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span id="region_yaml">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#region_yaml" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">region</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">String</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Specifies the region in which to obtain the CSS flavors. If omitted, the
provider-level region will be used.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span id="type_yaml">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#type_yaml" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">type</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">String</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Specifies the node instance type. The options are <code>ess</code>, <code>ess-cold</code>, <code>ess-master</code>
and <code>ess-client</code>.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span id="vcpus_yaml">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#vcpus_yaml" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">vcpus</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">Number</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Specifies the number of vCPUs in the CSS flavor.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span id="version_yaml">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#version_yaml" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">version</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">String</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Specifies the engine version. The options are <code>5.5.1</code>, <code>6.2.3</code>, <code>6.5.4</code>, <code>7.1.1</code>,
<code>7.6.2</code> and <code>7.9.3</code>.</p>
</dd></dl>
</pulumi-choosable>
</div>
